name: Space Corps
description:
Details

A simple bullet hell-ish game where you must collect as many energy boxes as possible while the solar system collapses all around you.

How To Play

There's 25 different screens you can move to. Your objective is to find the boxes that spawn in any of these screens. You can guide yourself with the mini-map on your right.

The beeps you'll hear are the radar. The beeps will be faster the closer you are to the next box. There's always a single box at any given time.

The number next to the lightning symbol is your score.

You have three lives, represented by the three hearts on your left. You will lose a life every time you hit an asteroid.

Controls

Use WASD or arrow keys to move around.

Credits

Game by Jerry Becerril.

Tools used: Godot, Aseprite, BFXR, Abundant Music.
